name: Reigns: Three Kingdoms
storyline: In this game the player will encounter the many factions, wars, and heroes of the saga as they swipe their way through negotiations, marry to strengthen alliances, and convert to gain more power. Discover new ways to enjoy Reigns' unique swiping mechanic as you uncover the many secrets of a vast storyline and a host of unexpected mini-games.
summary: Reigns: Three Kingdoms is inspired by the beloved Chinese epic, The Romance of the Three Kingdoms. This game will thrust you into the turbulent final years of the Han dynasty. Swipe your way through negotiations, relationships and strategic alliances!
